channel.title: Comments on: Accurate Shots Videos
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: 1. Stupid Americans and their ping pong... they play it in pubs. 2. Have you noticed that they always throw the cans high in the air? So if there is a string that pulls the can tword the garbage then it could work easily.
item.content:encoded:
1. Stupid Americans and their ping pong… they play it in pubs.
2. Have you noticed that they always throw the cans high in the air? So if there is a string that pulls the can tword the garbage then it could work easily.
